LanguageData.Plutonium.label: 钚
LanguageData.EnrichedUranium.label: 浓缩铀
LanguageData.DepletedUranium.label: 贫铀
LanguageData.DepletedUranium.description: 贫铀。贫铀是一种非常致密的金属，可用于制作贫铀弹药和屏蔽辐射.
LanguageData.FuelRods.label: 燃料棒
LanguageData.FuelRods.description: 核燃料棒用于核电站产生热量.由此产生过热蒸汽.
LanguageData.FuelRodsCracked.label: 损坏的燃料棒
LanguageData.FuelRodsCracked.description: 损坏的燃料棒.这些损坏的燃料棒带有高度放射的,如果不进行妥善处理,可能会导致火灾.
LanguageData.SpentFuelRods.label: 乏燃料棒
LanguageData.SpentFuelRods.description: 乏燃料棒将会作为核废料处理.
LanguageData.ChunkRadioactiveSlag.label: 放射性矿渣块
